column2: Learned Trial Judge failed to compartmentalize the evidence against each accused
and failed to apply the principles governing the concept of common intention.
Failure on the part of the learned Trial Judge to narrate or evaluate the evidence of
the 1st and 2nd accused-appellants has caused serious prejudice to him occasioning in
a deprivation of a fair trial.
Rejection of evidence of the 1st and 2nd accused-appellants are flawed causing serious
